abilities.name: Extreme Speed
abilities.effect: You pay Colorless less to retreat Arcanine for each Energy attached to it.

attacks.name: Fire Blow
attacks.effect: You may discard any number of Energy cards attached to Arcanine when you use this attack. If you do, flip a number of coins equal to the number of Energy cards you discarded. This attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage for each heads.
